name: The Seat of Sacrifice
content:
• Terror Unleashed Group wide drop to 1HP, everyone must be fully healed to remove debuff
  • Absolute Fire III - Gives Pyretic debuff, do nothing until this debuff drops off
  • Absolute Blizzard III - Be moving when this goes off
  • Imbued Sword (Fire|Blizzard) - Above Fire/Blizzard will go off when he does Sword attach
  • Eldragon DiveWatch out for the dragon on half of the arena, may go off with other mechanics
  • Ultimate Crossover Tank LB3 must be used or wipe
  • If tethered to a Spectral Egi - point it away from the group
